Articles.Content:
In another thread I mentioned how my game was plagued by stutters, and by removing all my mods, I removed the stutters from my gameplay. I did some testings, and found out it was the contract packs that caused them. Even just one is enough to cause stutters. Another player also had a similar problem, and by removing the contract pack, the stutter was gone as well.

So what causes this stutter with contract packs? Is there a way to fix it?
